Text:
I open the Application, and it comes up with:

"Error"

"Program application database cannot be found"

I looked online and the 'sys.txt' file appears to be empty. Should this have something inside? I can see the maps in the files on my iphone when I SSH into it, but I think the sys.txt needs some code to make the database actually work..?

EG: The HTC Touch needs this:

[folders]
app="\My device\Internal Storage\iGO8"
